Viewsonic VA2246-LED 22 DVI FULL HD LED
The ViewSonic VA2246-LED is a 22" (21.5 viewable) widescreen monitor with an LED backlight and glossy, thin-bezel design ideal for use in the home or at the office. With Full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution and a 10M:1 dynamic contrast ratio, the VA2246-LED delivers stunning brightness and contrast, while a quick 5 ms response time ensures crisp pictures and smooth playback. The display includes a VGA and DVI inputs provide flexible and convenient connectivity, while a VESA-mountable design offers additional mount flexibility. With an efficient LED backlight and energy-saving Eco mode, the VA2246-LED is an environmentally friendly display choice. In addition, along with one of the industrys best pixel performance policies provides great value for the stylish, high-performance VA2246-LED display.
